title: A Flourishing Industry
content: “Are the industries of this country in a flourishing condition?” asked a Traveller from a Foreign Land of the first man he met in America. “Splendid!” said the Man. “I have more orders than I can fill.” “What is your business?” the Traveller from a Foreign Land inquired. The Man replied, “I make boxing-gloves for the tongues of pugilists.”

book.title: 绮丽的寓言
